basic.description: The course will look at three aspects of "Sentencing and Imprisonment":  (1) The Principles of Sentencing: Philosophical and Empirical Perspectives:  (2)  The Law of Sentencing in Canada; and  (3)  Judicial Remedies for Convicted Persons.  Time permitting, specific topics like Murder, Preventive Detention and Aboriginal Offenders will be looked at.  The course will follow a lecture/discussion format and the (2008) Second Edition of "Sentencing and Penal Policy in Canada" will be used.
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: Sentencing & Imprisonment
